## InterfaceType.withOptional() method

Create a type with all properties of the current type, plus the given optional properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withOptional<PartialProps extends Properties>(...args: [props: PartialProps] | [name: string, props: PartialProps]): TypeImpl<IntersectionType<[this, PartialType<PartialProps>]>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                             | Description |
| --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| args      | \[props: PartialProps\] \| \[name: string, props: PartialProps\] |             |

[TypeImpl](./types.typeimpl.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IntersectionType](./types.intersectiontype.md)<!-- -->&lt;\[this, [PartialType](./types.partialtype.md)<!-- -->&lt;PartialProps&gt;\]&gt;&gt;
